location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to The President and Members of the Native Pension Fund Committee, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus asks if clerks or other servants who retire from public employment at their own request are entitled to the return of any part of their contributions to the Native Pension Fund.
